member.name: T:W.Net.TcpHelpers
member.summary: Helper methods for TcpClient and NetworkStream

member.name: M:W.Net.TcpHelpers.SendMessageAsync(System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream,System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Action{System.Exception},System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource)
member.summary: Writes data to the specified NetworkStream
member.param: The stream on which to write data
The data will be written in chunks this size, or less
The data to write to the network stream
Delegate called once the data has been written or an error occurs
Can be used to cancel the write operation
member.returns: The Task on which this method executes

member.name: M:W.Net.TcpHelpers.ReadMessageAsync(System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream,System.Int32,System.Action{System.Byte[],System.Exception},System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource)
member.summary: Reads data from the network stream. The first 4 bytes should indicate the message size.
member.param: The network stream from which to read data
Data will be read in chunks this size, or less
Delegate called when a full message has been received, or an error occurs
Can be used to cancel the read operation
member.returns: The Task on which this method executes

member.name: M:W.Net.TcpHelpers.IsMessageAvailable(System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream,System.Action{System.Exception})
member.summary: Checks the NetworkStream.DataAvailable
member.param: The NetworkStream to check
Called if a SocketException occurs

member.name: M:W.Net.TcpHelpers.IsMessageAvailable(System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient,System.Action{System.Exception})
member.summary: Checks the TcpClient.Available value
member.param: The TcpClient to check
Called if a SocketException occurs
member.returns: True if at least 4 bytes of data are available
